'''Benjamin James Lee''' ([[1981]] - [[4 May|May 4]] [[2003]]) was an American artist.

Lee suffered from [[wikipedia:Duchenne muscular dystrophy|Duchenne muscular dystrophy]] since he was 6, and died at age 22. In his short life, he was an active member of [[The Tolkien Society]], and contributed artwork and poetry to the Society's publications.
